00105     static const u32 BIT_NUM = 32;
00106     static const u32 MAX_ID = (static_cast<u64>(1) << (BIT_NUM - 1)) - 1;

00120 #define ckID_(str) ckID::genIDForSystem(CK_ID_00(str, sizeof("" str)))
00121 
00122 
00123 #define CK_ID_00(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? 0 : (CK_ID_01(str, len - 1) | 0x80000000))
00124 #define CK_ID_01(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_02(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00125 #define CK_ID_02(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_03(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00126 #define CK_ID_03(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_04(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00127 #define CK_ID_04(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_05(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00128 #define CK_ID_05(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_06(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00129 #define CK_ID_06(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_07(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00130 #define CK_ID_07(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_08(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00131 #define CK_ID_08(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_09(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00132 #define CK_ID_09(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_10(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00133 #define CK_ID_10(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_11(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00134 #define CK_ID_11(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_12(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00135 #define CK_ID_12(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_13(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00136 #define CK_ID_13(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_14(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00137 #define CK_ID_14(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_15(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00138 #define CK_ID_15(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_16(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00139 #define CK_ID_16(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_17(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00140 #define CK_ID_17(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_18(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00141 #define CK_ID_18(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_19(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00142 #define CK_ID_19(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_20(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00143 #define CK_ID_20(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_21(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00144 #define CK_ID_21(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_22(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00145 #define CK_ID_22(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_23(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00146 #define CK_ID_23(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_24(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00147 #define CK_ID_24(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_25(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])

00149 #define CK_ID_26(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_27(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00150 #define CK_ID_27(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_28(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00151 #define CK_ID_28(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_29(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00152 #define CK_ID_29(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_30(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00153 #define CK_ID_30(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_31(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00154 #define CK_ID_31(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : CK_ID_32(str, len - 1) * 37 + str[len - 1])
00155 #define CK_ID_32(str, len) ((len <= 1) ? str[0] : ckID::ThrowTooLongStringExceptionForSystem())
